resources.string:
Eye Care Tips:
 1. Eat Healthy

2.Do not rub your eyes

3.Give your eyes a rest

4.If your eyes are red and swollen, please consult the ophthalmologist.

5.More tips can be found at:
 https://nyulangone.org/conditions/conjunctivitis/treatments/home-treatments-for-conjunctivitis

6.If diagnosed with Conjunctivitis, please quarantine to avoid spread.

Thank you! Thank you!
